page.title: 20A.5.,LLANGOLLEN.
page.content: The A.5 runs through Llangollen and connects{Holyhead to London.}The traffic which uses the A.5 is of various kinds.During a{1 hour traffic {census}on a Thursday afternoon_368 cars_18 buses 6 motorbikes_28 cycles and 26 pedestrians passed the{Fire {Station}area.The stretch of A.5 through Llangollen is rather{narrow and there are{parking restrictions along its length.A questionnaire given to shopkeepers along the A.5 in Llangollen concluded that most shopkeepers don't mind the noise.Most of the shopkeepers think parking is a problem and only one out of two people object to the proposed by_pass.During the investigation the school team recommend{a)the road should be widened {b)there should be a speed restriction {c)less exhaust pollution d)more {parking restrictions.
